lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I've been so lucky to be born into the circumstances I was born into. This is my way of helping others who, because of mere happenstance, aren't as lucky as I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the court system, helping the judges decide the cases before them.

lenders.name: Parham
lenders.loan_because:
I don't wish any institutional bank to give money to those in need. Together with patience, we can bring down the corrupt and greedy worldwide banking system... One cent at a time!

Side note: I only lend to borrowers with their own photo, not their brother or husband's photos.

lenders.name: angel
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP.AND GIVE BACK THE BLESSING GOD HAS GIVE ME.
lenders.occupational_info: NOT AS HARD, AS WHAT I SEE OTHER PEOPLE DO TO CREATE A LIVING FOR THEMSELVES AND THERE FAMILIES.

lenders.name: SAGA (Alex)
lenders.loan_because: the world does not lack courage -- only opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student trying to start an organization that inspires others to live with an open mind when faced with the challenges of global disparity.

lenders.name: Nurcan/Ufuk
lenders.loan_because: for a better world.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I believe its good to give others a chance to fullfill there desires.
lenders.occupational_info: Exciting, and every day brings a new challenge.

lenders.name: jacqui
lenders.occupation: Asst Director of a university research institute
lenders.occupational_info: I study the impact of how human institutions affect resources--for example, how the rules established by a community in Uganda affect the forest that provides their livelihood, or how an irrigation system can be maintained effectively by a group of farmers in Nepal.

lenders.name: Arzu
lenders.loan_because: I will open new classrooms and buy new toys for kids, and give much better education to kids
lenders.occupational_info: baby day-care school

lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Frank & Cesar (My dog)
lenders.loan_because:
This really helps!
I can help people helping themselves to a better life.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I received a Kiva Gift Certificate and I very much like it!
lenders.occupational_info: Doing research on how small-scale sustainability initiatives can contribute to broader societal change.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed and provide for their families
lenders.occupational_info: Coordinate meetings for companies and organizations

lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lenders.name: Colin & Helen
lenders.occupation: Marine Search and Rescue & Wellness Facilitator
lenders.loan_because: Extending beyond ourselves to others is where we experience deeper love and growth.  It's adding value to our existence and rising towards our highest potential to inspire others to do the same - reinforcing the beauty in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: In our lives we both offer assistance to others; inspiring

lenders.name: Jason Towns
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed and it feels good to give back.

lenders.occupational_info: Work as a Human Resources Consultant, particularly on search&selection.

lenders.name: Ben & Wilma
lenders.loan_because: Helping people in need by way of a hand up, not a hand out, is the basis for all people to succeed. "Give a man a fish and feed him for a day, teach a man to fish and feed him for a lifetime"
lenders.occupational_info: I design kitchens & bathrooms for our local renovation and new home market.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: It's great to be able to help someone directly.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small printing company designing jobs for clients on an Apple Mac computer system

lenders.name: Larry and Susan
lenders.loan_because: We want to help.  This program shows the great things that can happen when people come together to help people.

lenders.name: Jaco McGuinness
lenders.loan_because: Helping someone realize a goal makes me feel good.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It expands my horizons and connects me with hard working people in communities I can only imagine.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage software & system development for a large government agency concerned with improving local government finances.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: My mom told me about it, and I thought it was a good way to help people.  And I like potato chips, so I thought I should invest in Mrs. Tavae's taro chips!
lenders.occupational_info: I learn at home, skateboard, play Runescape, and hang out with my family and friends.

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.occupational_info: I write for a children's magazine. The magazine is used by teachers in schools to help kids learn about science.

lenders.name: ozgur
lenders.occupational_info: I go to people's houses or workplaces to fix their computer problems.

lenders.name: merve
lenders.loan_because: i just wanna help the people needs help

lenders.name: azrin
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start operating a business and getting on in life. I have a disability and as I am unable to be a life saver anymore , I put my skills back in serving the community.Providing them with the education they need.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a doctor till I got hurt in a UN Peace Keeping Mission. Now I teach and provide network security, e-commerce and other things to help someone run a business and grow online!

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people across the world the opportunity to pursue their economic goals.

lenders.name: OnLiveIT
lenders.loan_because: Mivel fontosnak tartjuk, hogy a munkánkkal megtermelt jövedelem ne csak saját jólétünket szolgálja, az OnLiveIT elhatározta, hogy rendszeresen támogatja a KIVA-t és a kölcsönért folyamodókat.
lenders.occupational_info:
Cégünk azzal a szándékkal jött létre, hogy a vállalati informatika területén szerzett évtizedes tapasztalatainkkal és az információ technológiai ipar legfejlettebb szoftver és hardver eszközeivel álljunk ügyfeleink szolgálatára.

Célunk, hogy olyan megoldásokat ajánljunk a szolgáltatásaink iránt érdeklödöknek, melyek nem csak egyedi problémákra nyújtanak gyógyírt, hanem valódi termelöerövé teszik szállítóink termékeiben megtestesülö tudást.

Valljuk, hogy az informatikai rendszerek, bár egyre fontosabb helyet foglalnak el a cégek életében, feladatuk a vállalati értékteremtö folyamatok minél hatékonyabb kiszolgálása, nem pedig az uralkodás azok felett.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Giving back seems only natural when you've been so fortunate yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I study why people act the way they do.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I want to help you.
lenders.occupational_info: student

lenders.name: Julianna
lenders.loan_because: I believe that empowering people this way will really change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise the Mayor and Councillors that govern our City how to make decisions, while playing by the rules.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Some people can use the money more wisely than I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I study ways we can use computers (algorithms) to solve problems that are difficult for people to solve on their own.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I travel around the world and want to help out those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: My company helps secure companies that do transactions on the Internet. I run a sales team.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home to take care of my children.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: it is my duty and my pleasure to share my blessings with others.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because:
long journeys begin 
with a single step
with kiva i can help 
with many steps
lenders.occupational_info: 8th grade special education teacher

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: God loves us all and He gave me more than enough.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an adoption agency to help kids deal with their past so they might move toward the future.

lenders.name: Rico
lenders.loan_because: I believe in microfinance and the big hopes of small people striving for better lives from their microbusinesses. A little dash of opportunity goes a long way for a lot of people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Kiva for Southeast Asia and the Pacific

lenders.name: Courage
lenders.loan_because: I am a driver and a university student but dropped out because of money problems. I could not afford $2000 per year for 4 years course at the university college of criminal justice where I study security Management. I wish to loan some money to buy a taxi to work with to make a living as there is no other way for me to make money.
lenders.occupational_info: I run errands online and offline, do some private investigation services having dropped out of the university. But I am also a commercial driver and I am loaning this money to buy a taxi.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I think if some people live in homes and make a living than all people deserve to.
lenders.occupational_info: I like school because you learn and meet new people and have fun and learn at the same time.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.occupation: Executive for a multinational in Asia
lenders.loan_because: Personal experiences during my youth in Africa as well as my thesis on a micro credit organization in Mali called Kafo Jiginew, amazed me on what impact micro credit could have on the improvement of people's life. Joining Kiva gives me the opportunity to support a development model I strongly believe in. Directly helping people with clear actions leading to tangible results is really motivating. And since I am blessed to have a great life it is only fair I give a little help for others to improve theirs...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Asia for a multinational specializing in the sales and distribution (logistics) of pharmaceutical products.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I started my business with only $2000. I have been very successful, but I could have grown much faster and it would have been much easier if I had access to capital. I want to encourage economic development around the world. Only through free enterprise can people raise their standard of living and help themselves, their families, and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Semi-retired - I only have four businesses now.

lenders.name: Merrick
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people that are not as fortunate as we are.

lenders.name: KayKay
lenders.loan_because: I simply like the idea of "loans that change lives"...

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I'm a karma whore.
lenders.occupational_info: Retain the earth.

lenders.name: Dioni
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: jatraqueros
lenders.loan_because: We are withdrawing our funds from Kiva ... and making future loans through other organizations because Kiva continues to promote cockfighting businesses by posting cockfighting loans on the Kiva website. ..... For over a year Kiva has been requested by many, many Kiva lenders to please add bloodsports to the list of businesses for which Kiva will not post loans, but kiva management adamantly refuses. Therefore we are withdrawing our funds and supporting other more humane organizations.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm all about Books, Film, Food, and Culture.  I keep my members informed about the latest and best of that stuff.  Warning: I'm extremely addictive.  My nickname is hatcrack.

lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful feeling to be able to help the other people in need all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: enjoyable!

lenders.loan_because: I believe you can create a big improvement in someone else's life by making a small contribution to them and then that person can make an improvement in another person's life and this can go on forever like a chain reaction.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm self employed. I import construction materials. I also work in our family business which is tourism.

lenders.name: Nigel
lenders.loan_because: Let's see if this new-fangled "capitalism" works!

lenders.name: adil
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel like one of those toffs on Dragon's Den

lenders.occupational_info: Wizard (aka software developer). Bassist. Social networker. Science nut. Current events/politics junkie. Linux FTW. Hot saucier. Foodie/boozie. Let's talk...

lenders.name: Willie
lenders.loan_because: I need a loan for Operating Capital of my Web Development Business.  I am 39 years young and married with a thirteen year old beautiful daughter.  I have a 3.7 grade point average (gpa) and I attend Kaplan University.  I am pursueing a Bachelor's in Computer Science, Information Technology and Web Development.  I graduate in June 2007, and I am seeking $3,750.00 for Operating Capital , this amount will cover my running of the business for the next 3 months until I can officially have the business running efficiently and effectively as a Web Designer.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a general contractor that repairs and installs heating systems in homes and residential properties.  Also, I am a Plumber that fixes drains and sewer problems.

lenders.name: Jannes
lenders.loan_because: What good is money if it can't help anyone?

lenders.name: Dominique

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I can

The Hawaiian word 'kihikau' means 
"to give generously from the heart 
without expectation of return".

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: i have been lucky enough to have the privilege to have enough to help others. it is my duty to pass on my blessings. and you know what they say it's much better to give than to recieve
lenders.occupational_info: i am a full time student at palm Beach Communnity college. i have a full time job. i am extremely busy but i enjoy every minute of my life. i have too many goals in life but if i accomplish half of them (which i will) my legacy will live on way beyond my time.

lenders.name: Melinda
lenders.loan_because: Giving to these businesses helps the entire community, and it is giving people the opportunity to get themselves to a better life. It is a gift that lasts and once it is repaid it can be given back to help more people.
lenders.occupational_info: I feed and care for miniature animals and a farm where people and children can come and learn about the animals. I am going to school to become a Veterinarian.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the global market.  I grew up in Africa, so this is how I share my blessings with my childhood home.

lenders.name: todd
lenders.loan_because:
The repayment rate at Kiva.org is 100%!  To put things into perspective; A lender  has a higher chance of getting pregnant while using a condom than having a loan default!

I loan to Kiva because I am a capitalist and a big proponent of microfinancing. Over a span of of time, a small loan of just $50 can be used multiple times by several different entreprenuers to help start several different businesses. Talk about getting a bang for your buck and you get to feel good that you helped so many people!

Financing entrepreneurs is not only beneficial to the individual loaners but the emergence of small businesses also benefits the local economy. With economic growth comes improvement of living conditions and overall decrease in poverty. It's G-G-R-R-REAT!!
lenders.occupational_info: I use a computer to create layouts and designs for posters, websites, books, etc. . .

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I spent two years in the Peace Corps in Atakpame, Togo in West Africa.  I understand the need for sustainable business and productive loans.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe that shared happiness is doubled happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I help websites giving their users a very good feeling, a delightful experience. It's like teaching a surfboard being a good ride ;-)

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the kindness of strangers.
lenders.occupational_info: I protect people who have had money they invested stolen. Sometimes people don't pay attention. Sometimes they trust people they should not. I help them try to get their money back.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: ... it's an abundant universe.
lenders.occupational_info:
I create art quilts, mixed media collages, paintings, photographs, and collections of words. 

I also teach artists, musicians, and nonprofits how to use social media effectively.

lenders.name: SAGA
lenders.loan_because: We are a graduate student organization for the School of International Studies at Oklahoma State University. Our membership is composed of students from all over the world. Many of us have first hand knowledge of the need for organizations like KIVA. We hope to help people achieve their economic goals to lessen the level of extreme poverty around the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: The Student Association of Global Affairs, SAGA, organizes events that promote awareness of varying cultures and regional problems around the world. We hope to increase the interaction between cultures and in the process be a  social service organization which helps to make a difference. Once a year we sponsor a university and community fundraiser, all the profits of which will go towards a KIVA project.

lenders.name: Charny
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to be a part of the global community!
lenders.occupational_info: I attend a graduate program in economics and teach an introductory micro/macro economics course.

lenders.loan_because: I admire people willing to work hard for their dreams. I have worked hard and enjoyed some success. I wish to pass on some of the fruits of my labors so that others may do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now retired.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Lisa

lenders.name: linda and greg
lenders.loan_because: we all want happiness and freedom from suffering.

lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses communicate to customers by writing ads, web content, and other marketing deliverables.

lenders.loan_because: I really like to help people and I want people that are trying to help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get ahead in a poor country, believe me, I was born and raised in one.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Police Officer.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: tikkun olam

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.whereabouts: Roskilde D e n m a r k

lenders.name: Lev
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Chemistry reserach.

lenders.name: dj80hd
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need.
lenders.occupational_info: I create computer software and electronic music.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make their life better

lenders.name: Meditation7
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the lives of others. And I like to see the faces and the stories of the people to whom the money is going -- I feel connected to them that way.

lenders.name: Projectline
lenders.loan_because: We loan to 3 businesses each month because we want to support other small businesses around the world. We are different but the same.
lenders.occupational_info: Projectline provides marketing consulting and marketing project management services.

lenders.name: Walden Green Montessori
lenders.loan_because: Every year our class does a unit on world economics.  We loan to Kiva because our class feels strongly in the spirit of Social Entrepreneurism.  Global outreach should be taught early on in life.  Our kids donated money out of their own pockets because they feel strongly that everyone has the right to be self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a classroom of learners who feel strongly that reaching out to others and promoting peace in the world is of the highest importance!

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be able to make a decent living.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is too boring to describe with brief periods of insanity.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting entrepreneurship in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in philanthropy consulting in Washington, D.C.

lenders.name: Nancy & Monte
lenders.loan_because: That is what we are all here on earth to do...help each other.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people helping others is the best way to try and make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I sell all kinds of insurance with a family business

lenders.name: Clem and Jean Ady
lenders.loan_because: We consider our loan to be a teaching tool for Clem's international finance students.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: An investment in people is the most important investment you can make. As humans, we must believe in the power of ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate home buyers during their largest investment/purchase of their lives. By awakening them to the condition of there soon to be home, they are given the proper tools to negotiate for repairs and/or maintain their home or walk away from the deal.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: every night I wonder what I can do to make things better.
lenders.occupational_info: I layout and design workbooks and books.

lenders.name: Marian
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe people want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 17 year olds how to analyze and  care about the world.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am lucky enough to be able to share.
lenders.occupational_info: As a retired firefighter/paramedic and former marine I now enjoy a more sedentary occupation as a writer, photographer and consultant on all things disastrous.

lenders.name: Fernando Vieira
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending is a smart and efficient way to affect positive change in the world.

lenders.name: Tony Das
lenders.loan_because: To help those who are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'll come back to this!

lenders.name: Han
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with a large, strong family, a good job, and a community that I love.  My family and I are lucky and have what we need.  Other people are going to make a lot better use of this money than we would!
lenders.occupational_info: I help teachers, youth workers, and community leaders to improve schools and give young people a better start in life.

lenders.name: Zelena
lenders.loan_because: Because I can and believe that with little contributions like these anyone can make a significant difference.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I have seen so much need in this world and am compelled to action.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer for an NGO dedicated to improving the lives of orphaned and destitute children around the world.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: a little goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on biological problems using computers.

lenders.name: Ara
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected in ways we don't even know about; Kiva is a way we can choose to be connected.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate.  Therefore it is my responsibility to use my resources to help other people improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I  help raise funds to make book purchases for the local University Library.  And I enjoy being with my two grandchildren, one of whom is in the photo with me.

lenders.name: Lynn & Janet
lenders.loan_because: Our daughter got us started by giving us two $25 credits to be loaned out.

lenders.name: Noel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a technology Company.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: I feel connected, invested way beyond any financial commitment and making a difference 1/2 a world away, well that just feels darn good!
lenders.occupational_info: I work from my home because in my job I use my computer and telephone to complete my work administering different loan/grant programs for companies that are growing their business.

lenders.name: Eric & Liz
lenders.loan_because: We have been fortunate in that family and friends have helped us out when we were in need.  We just want to pass that kindness on.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.occupation: Advisor Angel Investor in emerging markets
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed, having recovered from paralysis of mercury poisoning--(dental amalgams are 50-74% mercury and leak 24/7 into our brains) after returning a wheelchair and firing Mayo Clinic.  Chose to get to root of my "disease" (a toxicity, in fact, which is curable) by removing toxic Hg amalgams with biological dentist, chelating 2 yrs under German protocol by Dr Dietrich Klinghardt (removal of heavy metals from brain and organs).  Must 'buck the system' and go your own way by defying American medicine to recover our real wealth––our precious health.
lenders.occupational_info: Launch new ventures (fintech, food, medical, greentech) to make the world a better place in Africa, Arab Gulf, frontier and emerging markets.

lenders.name: Theresa from Minnesota
lenders.loan_because: Once I needed the help to raise my young childen.  Now I care to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office setting where my skills consist of using different applications on the computer. Customer satisfaction through service sales orders and other multi-tasks.   I also work second job on weekend as a care attendant at retirement home. Help elderly people with daily needs.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate to receive help when I needed it -- it is nice to be able to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children how to play the piano.

lenders.name: Estelle
lenders.loan_because: Even a small amount of support can make a tremendous difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help filmmakers assemble the pieces of their footage to create a compelling story.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who desire to be a productive part of their society.  I prefer to loan to those who are either producing goods on their own, selling items locally produced (not imported), or providing a needed service in their local community.  I encourage others involved with Kiva to also have this critical view for lending.  We as a community must avoid becoming the funding source for cheap imported goods to those who receive loans, especially when it undercuts the ability of their local economy to then produce those same goods.  Import businesses should be a last resort, and only done if there is absolutely no hope for starting local production.  It is also important not to try and leverage a change in cultures just for the sake of inserting a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I live in the United States, and work in the U.S. and abroad.  In my job, I try to solve complex problems that exist in our society.

lenders.name: StatSpeaking
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to live a happy and fulfilled life
lenders.occupational_info: I help organizations collect and analyze data to make better decisions

lenders.name: Cathy and kids
lenders.loan_because: what an awesome opportunity to make a difference in someone's life. we have so much in our life, it is a great way to give back and to teach my children how we can affect change in the world.

lenders.name: Lynn and David
lenders.occupational_info: I am a portrait photographer. David is an Electrical Technician.

lenders.name: Caleb
lenders.loan_because: It is far better to help individual lives in little ways than to try to change the whole world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'd like to think of myself as a writer, a relationship builder, a story teller, a ruffled-feather smoother.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: God's word, in Luke 12:48 " From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked."  We are told to not store up our treasure here on earth, but in heaven.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for business owners that employ 150 people. They are opening several new restaurants now.  My work involves hiring new workers, helping with problems on the job, handling all the necessary paperwork for payroll and insurance and many other things.

lenders.name: Harry Spanglet
lenders.loan_because: The Kiva approach is such a great idea.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: creating jobs is the only way to fight poverty and improve lives in the long term.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure everyone follows the rules.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I own a small company ourselves so we are very interested in business. We loan because we have traveled extensively and have always admired the people we have seen running small business around the world. We feel micro lending provides a unique opportunity for us to help make a difference to some of the people that really need it. Ultimately we are just very interested in business and are grateful to see and share this interest with people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a small company called Slate Works where my wife and I hand make home and garden decor out of slate. We sell our slate products to both small businesses and to people that attend craft shows across Canada.

lenders.name: Manu
lenders.loan_because: One world - one people!!!

lenders.name: Errol
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in South Africa with poverty never far away and I really believe that helping someone to fish is so much more useful and sustainable than offering them a single fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm helping to spread the good word about Kiva in the UK.

lenders.name: Rodolphe  Le Clech
lenders.occupation: Teacher of french as a foreign language
lenders.loan_because: it's a good compromise between sending money to a charity and doing nothing... I find more useful and interesting funding someone's concrete project than giving anonymously to a big organization. And Kiva's website is very well done! Hopefully more projects to be financed, especially in services and health area, are coming soon.
lenders.occupational_info: Mainly teaching french to finnish people.

lenders.name: Nanda
lenders.occupational_info: I am self employed... I do dabble with New Technology.

lenders.name: Jearld & Renee
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes the small things we do have a very big impact
lenders.occupational_info: We have a wonderful family and feel blessed for the life we have.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I can make the world a better place. I can take the blessings God has bestowed upon me and share those blessings with others.

lenders.name: Lorri
lenders.loan_because: "The life I touch for good or ill will touch another life, and that in turn another, until who knows where the trembling stops or in what far place my touch will be felt." Frederick Buechner
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Corporate Communications department of a large financial institution. I've been to all 7 continents and seen firsthand many of the types of people who are requesting loans.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Empowering entrepreneurs with capital is a key to poverty alleviation.
lenders.occupational_info: I help optimize and manage the lending processes of a microfinance firm in India.

lenders.name: javier troncoso
lenders.loan_because: tengo una salon de belleza que lo gerencio junto a mi esposa y necesitamos un credito para seguir ampliando el local
lenders.occupational_info: salon de bellleza-spa lugar de relajacion y recuperacion del estres diario del trabajo

lenders.name: Benson
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities that have been presented to me in my life. Even if it is a small gesture I want to support others by helping create opportunity for them.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide computer technology consulting and support services primarily to small and mid-size companies.

lenders.name: Edry
lenders.loan_because: Because we help ourselves by helping others, and it is an excellent example for my daughter.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in a Dr's office answering phones, scheduling appointments and doing other office related tasks.  
I am also a single mom to a fantastic daughter and leader of a high school Girl Scout Troop.

lenders.name: Rudy
lenders.loan_because: To assist entrepreneurs in developing nations to reach their business goals, earning a living for themselves in the process.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an enviromental firm that designs and manufactures technology that is used for waste water treatment.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It is so easy to make a difference in someones life by sharing part of what I have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: I design clothing and sell it directly to women through fine art/craft shows

lenders.name: Kirsten
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my share to eliminate world hunger.
lenders.occupational_info: I love my garden but also roaming and finding a Dall sheep in Alaska.

lenders.name: Lis & Vikki
lenders.loan_because: There are few things more satisfying in life than helping others help themselves. With Kiva there is a direct connection to the people we help and, unlike giving to charities, we might get our money back and experience the pleasure of giving all over again.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I know of the great need for employment and business in third world countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and travel often throughout the world.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.occupational_info: I teach college students how to improve the health of their communities as well as their own health.

lenders.name: Diana K.
lenders.loan_because: Through Kiva my loans reach out across the world. It is not a handout...it is a loan. What dignity to not just have a handout but to realize that some one thinks what you are doing is good and that you are responsible. This is immediate...your donations are not bogged down in the red tape of politics or huge organizations were a large percentage of the donations go to the people running the organization.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Mom, wife, foster care advocate

lenders.name: Chanel and Josh
lenders.occupation: Stay at home mother/ HR Generalist

lenders.name: One Flight Up
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of artists, designers and business owners committed to the success and support of small entreprenuers around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We work with "Results" a grass-roots lobbying group committed to creating the political will to end poverty in our lifetime.

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because: This is the way it's supposed to be.

lenders.name: Storton Family
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to Do! We as a family are very blessed and would like to give others opportunities they might not otherwise have available, while teaching our children the importance of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and very active through numerous non-profit activities.

lenders.name: melissa
lenders.loan_because: I love Christ

lenders.name: Chad, Katie & Family
lenders.loan_because: We loan as a family who runs a small food business to directly support others working in food businesses to support their own family.
lenders.occupational_info: Chad runs a small food company that sells treats at a local Farmer's Market, and his main job is at a company  that builds websites; his job is to ensure that each website is built to do what the client needed it to do.  Katie is a former 2nd grade teacher and stays home raising our young family.

lenders.name: James & Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: If you give someone a fish, you feed them for a day, but if you teach them how to fish, you feed them for life! These entrepreneurs are learning how to fish and therefore making it better for themselves and everyone around them! Self reliance is the key! Way to go! If everyone can help, we can solve lots of problems! Please help each other when you can!
lenders.occupational_info: TEST TEST TEST

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help folk out of the poverty trap, recognizing that my lifestyle originally contributed to that. I hope to encourage others to participate and pressure governments to change trading practices.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Episcopal priest

lenders.name: Hal
lenders.loan_because: I feel like this is a great way to help folks less fortunate than me.  If I was in a situation like these budding entrepreneurs I would give anything to have resources available like this.  I'm glad to be able to help them in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm one of many tasked to defend the US and it's interests from the skies.  Specifically from the flight deck of the USS Kitty Hawk.

lenders.name: Elliott
lenders.occupation: Business manager, Ceo of Glass Company.
lenders.loan_because: Giving someone else a window of opportunity really makes you feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: My work consists of Dealing with glass blown art work. Buying them from a place at low demand and selling them in a place where the demand is high. Using connections to my advantage. NETWORKING!

lenders.name: Elena
lenders.loan_because: i know how it is to have a dream and need $$ to persue it.

lenders.name: Linda Martin
lenders.loan_because: I represent my covenant group at the Unitarian Universalist Church of Arlington.  We donate $5 each, monthly to build our loan fund.  This is our group service project.

lenders.name: Jordan,Emily and Sophie
lenders.loan_because: We decided as a family to loan this money.  We feel blessed to have money to loan.

lenders.name: matt
lenders.loan_because: I can't not do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help churches and non profits with their accounting needs.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I am able and I care
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Professor

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the small business owners in creating positive change in communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student of economics at American University in Washington, DC. I work also part-time at a local bank.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I like to help make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a university in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

lenders.name: Annalee
lenders.loan_because: We are here to help one another, in any way we can.
lenders.occupational_info: professional recreator

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected. :)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a serial entrepreneur.

lenders.name: Lawrence
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Linda and Rick
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lifestyle and to help them be more self sufficient.I like the idea that I can be more connected with who I am helping.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others sell and purchase homes.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I raised 3 children on my own.  I worked very hard to get through school and get a good job. I want to help someone else to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I speak with people who are interested in doing a business deal together, to help them get it done.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to earn a living and to support themselves and their family!
lenders.occupational_info: We are establishing a village for orphaned and abandoned children in Guatemala and are now living in Tecpan working on this!

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I practice being less attached to materiality while helping others succeed in life.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.occupational_info: I crunch numbers into an excel sheet.

lenders.name: Your Home-Your Money
lenders.loan_because: It will be the right thing to do in the right situation. Personal growth is exciting.
lenders.occupational_info:
Our company finds money to help people buy homes in Wisconsin, USA.  My business associate Bill and I talk about the things that matter second-most in your life - Your Home-Your Money - on our weekly radio show. We let our listeners decide what's MOST important to them, but we hope life, love, and family are #1.

We hope KIVA enters into YOUR life as you let others get a chance to grow. 

Join our ActiveRain KIVA Group at http://activerain.com/groups/KIVA

lenders.name: Noreen
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the frail elderly.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I was raised to help others in need. It falls in line with my Lutheran beliefs, my Nebraska upbringing, and my personal ideals.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a college student, and I used to write about baseball for a living. Now, I'm back to my roots, and I'm a horticulturalist. I grow plants for a living, and sell produce at the Farmer's Market.

lenders.loan_because: I can.  It makes me happy to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently a student majoring in Political Science in Seattle.

It's a great way to make a significant difference in many lives.

God requires us all to help one another.  This is one of the most awesome ways to do so.

lenders.loan_because: I can.  And people need it.  Enough said!

lenders.occupational_info: I am an English university student and work some hours in the writing assitance office, often with foreign students.

lenders.name: Evert
lenders.loan_because: It's good to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a journalist.

lenders.loan_because: it is an amazing way to help someone.

I find an enormous joy in helping people to adchive their dreams.
Hopefully the micro loans will help them to fullfill this! I'm very found of dreams come through, and telling me more about them, might gain loan for you!

lenders.name: Rolland
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of ordinary people helping ordinary people, with no government involved--purely voluntary--a helping hand, not a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I help manage a consulting practice for a large computer company.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.occupation: Global Payments Manager, One Acre Fund
lenders.loan_because: People in my life have given me a hand up, so I feel the need to give others that boost as well.
lenders.occupational_info: Living my dream of helping small farmers in Africa.

lenders.name: mackenzie
lenders.loan_because: I am  interested in helping people.

lenders.name: Rysiek
lenders.loan_because: I can make a major difference in people's lives with minimal inputs and without undermining their dignity or independence.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people configure and use collaboration software to improve information management in organizations.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: help empower people who have not been afforded the same opportunities I have had in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Exploration

lenders.name: Dack
lenders.loan_because: I can see the difference I make in the world, and all these businesses are so deserving.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young adults about United States History.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because:
"Would those of you who say it can't be done stop bothering those of us who are doing it."
-Anonymous

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: "Take these figures, Freeble, and shroud them in mystery and legend."

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I've been places where a little help has made a big difference.  I'm paying it forward... and teaching my children to live what you believe...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a single mother and a Girl Scout troop leader.  My work never ends, but there is always a way to help others...

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: Give and you shall receive.
lenders.occupational_info: Be a giver.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: The Lord has given me plenty of opportunity to provide for my family, It's only right that I give someone else that same chance to provide for their family.

lenders.name: Nanette
lenders.loan_because: We always have something to share no matter how small.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an independent associate of some affiliate programs. Presently, I am promoting Agloco, an internet global community.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: João
lenders.loan_because: I find it an appealing concept. 80% of the world's wealth is concentrated in 8% of the population. Now the trend can begin to shift, with a click of a button...
lenders.occupational_info: I develop energy production facilities, based on renewable sources (wind mostly).

lenders.name: Elsa
lenders.loan_because: this is one way I can try to help - and Kiva is such a cool idea. Recently I have started to focus on lending to Mongolian entrepreneurs because Mongolia has a special place in my heart. I am trying to learn the language and will come back soon!

lenders.name: Gary and Mary
lenders.loan_because: If you pray for peace, work for justice.

lenders.name: Aiesha
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we have a duty to help others, particularly those that are making the effort to build their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and make films about issues affecting young women and girls of Color and lead workshops designed to empower and build leadership skills.

lenders.name: Cari
lenders.occupational_info: I am working on my doctor of pharmacy degree.  When I finish, I will be a pharmacist working in a hospital taking care of sick people.  I will fill prescriptions and help educate people on this and other medications they are taking.

lenders.name: Schneider
lenders.loan_because: To help people around the world better their lives and the lives of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Plan, build, video security systems.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: There is a requirement. These entrepreneurs decided to make a difference for themselves and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lenders.name: Elizabeth & Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy traveling and want to help people in the countries we visit.
lenders.occupational_info: We both work at public service organizations. Elizabeth does policing research and Kimberly does online outreach for an environmental health organization.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: The idea of being able to actively participate in the global economy as something more than a consumer excites me.  I think that enabling individuals like me to lend to those that need it most is a promising step to reducing the gap between the developed and the developing world.  I believe that organizations like KIVA are helping fulfill the internet's promise of bringing the global community closer together.
lenders.occupational_info: I am secondary school teacher in a rural community in southwest Oklahoma.  I teach English to all of the secondary students (7-12) in my school.

lenders.name: marietta
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals to make great changes in their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for women during their pregnancies and in childbirth. I also provide family planning and gynecological services.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's the most effective way to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I work part time as a computer systems consultant and I also own and manage a commercial vineyard (Pinot Noir and Chardonnay) and a small community wireless internet service

lenders.name: Shyam
lenders.loan_because: I divide my allowance into 3's - $2 to save, $2 to spend, and $2 to share.  When I share my Mom matches my grant.  I hope this woman makes her goal for her loan.  I give $ for our food shelf too.Bye.
lenders.occupational_info: As a 6th grader I learn math, reading, spelling, gym, music, geography, cursive, and eat lunch.

lenders.name: Freida
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great idea.  $25 doesn't seem like a lot of money to me, but to others it's a good deal of money. I would like to be an business owner sometime soon, so it's very inspiring helping someone else out.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software programs.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I am in a position to.  I am quite lucky to live in Canada where my needs are mostly fulfilled and I am free to live my life the way I see fit.  That includes being married to a wonderful man.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I'm extremely lucky to have enough resources to run my own business and I've traveled to the countries where these businesses are. I feel it's an obligation to give something back. I also feel a special joy in assisting other women in growing their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop the strategies and tactics to help businesses and nonprofit organizations promote and sell their products and services.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone is deserving of hope and a prosperous future. (Jeremiah 29:11)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker working with children and families in poverty.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: This is the kind of thing that can actually change the world. It makes me feel good to find the ways to improve our world and cause real change.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair damaged homes. If there is a fire or a broken pipe I put the home back together.

lenders.name: art
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is a good cause and appreciate the ingenuity in using technology to help cross boundaries and connect people directly in this effort.
lenders.occupational_info: I am just a guy trying to live his life and see the world along the way.

lenders.name: Adina
lenders.loan_because: I have been involved in community development lending my whole career.  Kiva is a way for me to get directly involved in providing capital to help someone better support themselves, their family and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a consultant to organizations that make community development loans in the United States.  I help them plan for the future and make sure they have the needed resources to implement their plans.

lenders.name: Craig & Caitlin
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a good start ... and we can always use a helping hand :)

lenders.name: denis
lenders.loan_because: It is better to provide money directly to someone who can put it to immediate productive use than to some faceless organization. This way I know someone who needs the money is actually putting it to work.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher

lenders.name: Chunfucius
lenders.loan_because: "Let the world change you... and you can change the world"

lenders.name: Johnny
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people win at life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that boats float.

lenders.name: Sunny Hill Preschool
lenders.occupational_info: We explore, do art projects, play on the playground, learn about other ways of life and eat great snacks.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: No one should live in poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business and nonprofit leaders improve the financial performance of their organization and make it a place where people look forward to coming to work.

lenders.name: Rene
lenders.loan_because: Without family and friends to support me in my times of need I'm not sure where I would have turned for help.  It is for this reason that I give financial support to these small business owners who are not as fortunate as myself to have family resources available to improve their careers and their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mid-level healthcare provider who is a college professor and practitioner of family medicine.

lenders.name: Jessica & Sean
lenders.loan_because: it's important to help people improve their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom to my son, Colin.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I have many things to be thankful for, the opportunity to earn a good living and support my family. Because of these blessings, I want to give some back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a plasterer. I work on finishes on the exterior of commercial buildings(ex.stucco). We also do interior plaster and finish drywall.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help others in need directly.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business owner.  I own a production company called Verona Productions Ltd.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: It's a good way to support people to create their own self-sufficient business.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who have disabilities with their daily living skills in their own homes.

lenders.name: Randi
lenders.loan_because: I applaud and want to support people who are pursuing a positive course of action.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large multi-national firm and am responsible for business unit's financial performance.

lenders.name: Santosh Yadav
lenders.loan_because: I must

lenders.name: Andy & Rachel
lenders.loan_because: We believe in entrepreneurship. We have been blessed, and we'd like to give others the opportunity to succeed as well. When we heard about Kiva, we thought it was a great idea, so we joined.
lenders.occupational_info: We are both professional people. One of us is a nurse and the other works in IT for a company that offers educational financing.

lenders.name: Darrin White
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together. My life is wonderful. Sure, we struggle sometimes, but not so much we can't lend a hand to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Executive Director for one of Canada's provincial arts funding agencies. We distribute grants of public funds to artists and arts organizations.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: "No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another." Charles Dickens

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: many people have helped me throughout my life. I'm very grateful and want to pass on the favor to others.

lenders.name: Mike & Mary
lenders.loan_because: we have been blessed with an abundance of resources from our work and want to encourage entrepreneurs around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Mike is a Marketing / IT professional with a Fortune 500 company in the US.  Mike and Mary have been married for 30 years and have 3 wonderful children.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much, but $25 or $50 is so little here in the US where people will pay $3 for a cup of coffee which can be more than a day's wages in so many places.  It's a shame that politics and governments isolate people who aren't so different.
lenders.occupational_info: Digital photo restoration/manipulation and graphic design.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: it is deeply important to me to help others, even if it's on a modest scale. Living in Canada, I know I share in many privileges that others do not have access to. I want to support others to reach their goals, and have a decent, fulfilling life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English Writing/Communication at a community college in Ontario, Canada. I have taught a variety of students - nursing students, those studying to be architectural technicians & construction managers, and many others. I am a contract faculty, meaning that I am employed on a term-by-term basis, which can be a little stressful & uncertain (though nothing compared to what many others face). I feel very grateful to have the opportunity to teach in my field, and provide students knowledge about the social world, and the realities & struggles people face (with a global perspective whenever possible).

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to help themselves and just need a bit of a hand getting things going.
lenders.occupational_info: Like a building architect designs buildings, I design software systems.

lenders.name: Alex Trottier
lenders.loan_because: there's no reason not to :)

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: Money should be as fluid as possible. Anything else is a market failure.
lenders.occupational_info: I make it easier for people to find what they are looking for on the internet, without being scammed.

lenders.name: Clara
lenders.loan_because: Even though there are people dying everyday that I want to help, I feel it is more effective to improve the economy of third world countries and avoid poverty - treat the cause, not the aftereffects!

lenders.name: The 5
lenders.loan_because:
"A pessimist, they say, sees a glass of water as being half empty; and optimist sees the same glass as half full.  But a giving person sees a glass of water and starts looking for someone who might be thirsty."  
-G. Donald Gale
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in China.  This is my fourth year here.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: I can - and this is such a great use of the internet!
lenders.occupational_info: Writing features, news stories and producing brochures and magazines

lenders.name: Vikram
lenders.loan_because: One evening(5 months ago) while I was lounging in my Hotel Room in Salt Lake City, UT; I tuned into a documentary on Micro credit, and how 'Kiva' is chaging lives in a Mega way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Software Programming Consultant. I grew up in Bangalore, India and migrated to the USA about 5years ago. I design & build web-based business applications, much like the website www.kiva.org. I frequently travel to different cities in the US on work.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: microfinance is good business and helps to create economies in places in need of business.  I've been fortunate to be self-sufficient, and I want to help others become so.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people plan for financial goals and invest their money to reach those goals.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I interpret MRI, CT, Ultrasound, Nuclear Medicine, and X-Ray studies in a rural hospital.

lenders.name: Jeff and Rose
lenders.loan_because: a small risk for us can help someone create a world of difference for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Jeff teaches special education in a secondary school. Rose creates and prints maps for local government.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: Eye opening. Brought me to Kiva!

lenders.name: Akhil Chandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to share.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: Jesus said people would know that we were his by the way that we loved each other. This is a way I can live that out.
lenders.occupational_info: I study computer science, so I get to write programs that help other people do what they need to better. I'm working on my Ph.D. and I want to be a professor some day!

lenders.name: Vannie Ryanes
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving back; sharing and assisting those who are in need of  emotional and financial support. It is what I was taught, it is what I do. I am delighted to be one of the lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: My work allows me to write from home. I write about what I know about best; home, famiy, cooking, books and old movies. I have a good life.

lenders.name: Hanah
lenders.loan_because: local growth, even from international sources, is the only way to create a people-centred economy.

lenders.name: John & Noni
lenders.loan_because:
So little can provide so much, when properly invested!
Let's stick a finger in the eye of the IMF, WTO and WB!

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people the chance to work toward their dreams.

lenders.name: Felipe
lenders.loan_because: Microcredit loans allow individuals to create their own jobs and income streams, since their governments and private industry aren't producing enough of them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am Board Chair and CEO of Prisma Microfinance, Inc. (AKA Dr. Kendall Mau) in Honduras and Nicaragua, as well as an International MFI Financial Consultant in Africa, Central Asia, the Balkans, and South & Central Americas.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I admire everyone's entrepreneurial spirit.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I like feeling connected to people across the world and the best way to feel connected is to help someone. This is one small way I can help. I don't  necessarily believe that microfinance is the panacea some paint it to be, but it is one step in lifting individuals--particularly women--out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with organizations and individuals who make the world a better place, helping them build capacity, design their organizations, and cultivate leadership.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I think about people across the world with out work and I want to help them

lenders.name: tom
lenders.loan_because: There isn't anything more satisfying in helping a business grow into a self serving family provider and community builder
lenders.occupational_info: I provide employees the training to learn, grow and develop into a better person.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I care and want to support entrepreneurs in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a former school teacher who quit working to raise my two children.  I currently do some freelance writing at night after the little ones are asleep.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.occupation: Business person and father of two girls
lenders.loan_because: Those who can should!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people of all ages who have cognitive, intellectual and developmental disabilities.

lenders.name: Kalyan
lenders.loan_because: I get the opportunity to help people create livelihoods for themselves and reduce poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I apply engineering principles to solve problems in biology and medicine.

lenders.name: Vincent & Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: we found $100 and wanted to do good with it.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I just recently heard about the concept of Microfinance, and I wanted to contribute a little and learn how the process works.  Who can't spare a measly $25 or more?

lenders.name: Amalio
lenders.loan_because: It feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: Thinking of things to help the planet and the people who live in it.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.  I grew up on farms and can appreciate the business of working for yourself and the pride one has in the work they do.
lenders.occupational_info: I construct sand dykes for containment of tailings ponds using bull dozers, excavators and other very large equipment.
